name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable design. Perfect for music lovers and travelers.

name: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV
description: 55-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR, built-in streaming apps, and voice control. Ideal for home entertainment.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: Powerful gaming laptop with 16GB RAM, NVIDIA RTX 3060 GPU, and 1TB SSD. Great for gamers and professionals.

name: Smartphone with Triple Camera
description: Latest smartphone with a triple camera system, 128GB storage, and 5G support. Perfect for photography enthusiasts.

name: Smartwatch with Fitness Tracker
description: Sleek smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and fitness tracking. Syncs with smartphones for notifications and apps.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact Bluetooth speaker with 12-hour battery life and waterproof design. Ideal for outdoor adventures and parties.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB-backlit mechanical keyboard with customizable keys and fast response time. Perfect for competitive gaming.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with most smartphones and earbuds. Sleek design for home or office use.

name: Ultra-Slim Tablet
description: 10-inch tablet with 64GB storage, high-resolution display, and long battery life. Great for work and entertainment.

name: VR Headset
description: Immersive VR headset with 4K resolution and motion tracking. Perfect for gaming and virtual experiences.

name: External SSD Drive
description: 1TB external SSD with USB-C connectivity and fast transfer speeds. Ideal for backups and large files.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: Wi-Fi-enabled security camera with night vision, motion detection, and mobile app control. Keeps your home safe.

name: Ergonomic Wireless Mouse
description: Wireless mouse with ergonomic design and customizable buttons. Great for productivity and gaming.

name: Mini Projector
description: Portable mini projector with 1080p resolution and HDMI connectivity. Perfect for home theater or presentations.
